SEARCH
Package be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle

Class Board

java.lang.Object
be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Board extends Object implements Cloneable
This class represents the board of the Spectrangle game. It includes factor/multiple, the Bag, the piece (colors) that are already on the board. This class includes some utility methods to compute neighbors positions, check if a piece can be put, and rotation of a piece.
Author:
Belegkarnil

      public boolean inBounds(int x, int y)
      Know if a position is contained in the bounds of the board
      Parameters:
      x - the x-axis (column) position
      y - the y-axis (row) position
      Returns:
      true iff the position is on the board

      public boolean isBonus(Point position)

    • canPlace

      public boolean canPlace(Piece piece, Point position, int rotation)
      Know if a Piece with a given rotation can be put at a given position
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece to place
      position - The position on the board
      rotation - The rotation to apply on the piece
      Returns:
      true iff the rotated piece can be put at the given position

    • applyRotate

      public Color[] applyRotate(Piece piece, int rotation)
      Compute the rotation of a Piece, always consider the triangle base at bottom
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece to apply the rotation
      rotation - The rotation is an integer: 0 means no rotation, 1 for a single clockwise rotation, and 2 for two clockwise rotations
      Returns:
      an array of three Color (see indices: LEFT_COLOR, RIGHT_COLOR, and BASE_COLOR)

    • place

      protected int place(Piece piece, Point position, int rotation)
      Put a rotated Piece at a given position
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece to put on the board
      position - The position at which to put the piece
      rotation - The rotation to apply
      Returns:
      the increment of score but positioning the piece (i.e. factor * max(1,number of adjacents) * piece value)

    • getNeighbours

      public List<Point> getNeighbours(Point position)
      Get the neighbors position of a position
      Parameters:
      position - the position on the board
      Returns:
      A List of Point that represents valid (i.e. see inBounds(Point)) position adjacent to the given position

    • getLeftNeighbour

      public final Point getLeftNeighbour(Point position)
      Get the left position of a given position
      Parameters:
      position - the position on the board
      Returns:
      A Point on the left of the given position (Note: can be an invalid position)

    • getLeftValue

      public final int getLeftValue(Point position)
      Get the piece value at the left neighbor of a given position
      Parameters:
      position - the position on the board
      Returns:
      The piece value of the base neighbor iff exists (see getBaseNeighbour(Point)), otherwise NO_VALUE
